output: html_document

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)

```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
Volunteer_hours<- read.csv("C:/Users/angie/OneDrive/Vet School/Volunteer Vet Hours Log.csv")

```


```{r}
total_hours<- sum(Volunteer_hours$Total.Hours)
avg_hours<- mean(Volunteer_hours$Total.Hours)
```

```{r}
ggplot(Volunteer_hours, aes(Date, Total.Hours, colour = Start.Time))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  labs(title = "Volunteer hours by date", x = "Date", y= "Hours Worked")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
